eg.utils

Class ScreenParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.utils.ScreenParams

  • public class ScreenParams
extends java.lang.Object
    The screen size and parameters that depend on the screen resolution.

      • scaledSize

        public static int scaledSize(int unscaledSize)
        Returns the size which is scaled to the screen resolution. The specified unscaledSize is the size for the resolution assumed by Java (72 dpi).
        Parameters:
        unscaledSize - the unscaled size
        Returns:
        the scaled size

      • invertedScaledSize

        public static int invertedScaledSize(int scaledSize)
        Returns the size that is the inversion of the scaled size
        Parameters:
        scaledSize - the previously scaled
        Returns:
        the rounded inverted scaled size
        See Also:
        scaledSize
